title: Kirk Minihane Declares Victory Over Dave Portnoy
description:
Kirk Minihane has won the battle, but will Dave Portnoy join him in the war? Minihane talk dominated two hours of Barstool Radio yesterday after he told some hard truths on The Kirk Minihane Show. Today, Minihane recaps his contentious fight with Portnoy, declares victory, and gives his fans insight into what comes next. Also, Blind Mike is getting paid and Greg Hill is still on the air.Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
